description.plain:
Fitz and The Tantrums is an indie pop/neo soul band, featuring Michael Fitzpatrick as lead singer, and Noelle Scaggs as co-lead singer. The band also includes keyboardist Jeremy Ruzumna, saxophonist James King, bass player Joseph Karnes, and Percussionist John Wicks.

The band was started when in 2008, Fitzpatrick wrote the song “Breakin' the Chains of Love”. Fitzpatrick called James King, his college friend, who recommended singer Noelle Scaggs, and percussionist John Wicks. In turn, John Wicks brought bassist Joseph Karnes and keyboardist Jeremy Ruzumna to fully form the band. The band performed their first show at Hotel Café in Hollywood.

From there on, the band recorded four albums. This included the debut EP Songs for a Breakup, Vol. 1 released on August 11th, 2009, the debut studio album Pickin' Up the Pieces released in August 24th, 2010, their second studio album More than Just a Dream released on May 7th, 2013, and finally their self titled studio album, released on June 10th, 2016. In 2017, they have  released the single “Fool” in June.

body.plain:
Fitz and The Tantrums is an indie pop/neo soul band, featuring Michael Fitzpatrick as lead singer, and Noelle Scaggs as co-lead singer. The band also includes keyboardist Jeremy Ruzumna, saxophonist James King, bass player Joseph Karnes, and Percussionist John Wicks.

The band was started when in 2008, Fitzpatrick wrote the song “Breakin' the Chains of Love”. Fitzpatrick called James King, his college friend, who recommended singer Noelle Scaggs, and percussionist John Wicks. In turn, John Wicks brought bassist Joseph Karnes and keyboardist Jeremy Ruzumna to fully form the band. The band performed their first show at Hotel Café in Hollywood.

From there on, the band recorded four albums. This included the debut EP Songs for a Breakup, Vol. 1 released on August 11th, 2009, the debut studio album Pickin' Up the Pieces released in August 24th, 2010, their second studio album More than Just a Dream released on May 7th, 2013, and finally their self titled studio album, released on June 10th, 2016. In 2017, they have  released the single “Fool” in June.

songs.full_title: Out of My League by Fitz and The Tantrums
songs.title: Out of My League

description.plain: An electro-rock love song about a man who is beyond smitten with his out-of-his-league-lover. It’s too good to be true and the protagonist may be waiting for someone to pinch him, but luckily it is more than just a dream: it’s reality.

songs.full_title: HandClap by Fitz and The Tantrums
songs.title: HandClap

description.plain:
As a neo soul/indie pop song, it had peaked at #5 on the US Alternative Songs Billboard.

Lead singer of Fitz and The Tantrums, Fitz, claims that HandClap is “a primal tale of love and lust, a call to arms in the late hours of the night."Fitz has also stated "it’s the X-rated version of ‘Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind’ happening on a dance floor.”

songs.embed_content: Read “HandClap” by Fitz and The Tantrums on Genius

body.plain:
As a neo soul/indie pop song, it had peaked at #5 on the US Alternative Songs Billboard.

Lead singer of Fitz and The Tantrums, Fitz, claims that HandClap is “a primal tale of love and lust, a call to arms in the late hours of the night."Fitz has also stated "it’s the X-rated version of ‘Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind’ happening on a dance floor.”

songs.lyrics:
39 ContributorsHandClap Lyrics[Intro]
Turn it up

[Verse 1: FITZ]
Somebody save your soul
'Cause you've been sinnin' in this city, I know
Too many troubles
All these lovers got you losing control
You're like a drug to me
A luxury, my sugar and gold
I want the good life
Every good night, you're a hard one to hold

[Refrain: FITZ]
'Cause you don't even know
I can make your hands clap
Said I can make your hands clap

[Verse 2: FITZ]
Somebody save your soul
'Cause you've been sinning in this city, I know
Too many troubles
All these lovers got you losing control
You're like a drug to me
A luxury, my sugar and gold
I want your sex and your affection
When they're holdin' you close (Ha, ha, ha)
You might also like[Refrain: FITZ]
'Cause you don't even know
I can make your hands clap
Said I can make your hands clap

[Pre-Chorus: FITZ, FITZ & Noelle Scaggs]
Every night when the stars come out
Am I the only living soul around?
Need to believe you could hold me down
'Cause I'm in need of somethin' good right now
We could be screamin' 'til the sun comes out
And when we wake we'd be the only sound
I get on my knees and say a prayer, James Brown

[Chorus: FITZ & Noelle Scaggs]
That I can make your hands clap
That I can make your hands clap
(Turn it up)
That I can make your hands clap

[Verse 3: FITZ]
My flesh is searchin' for your worst and best
Don't ever deny
I'm like a stranger, gimme danger
All your wrong and your right
Secrets on Broadway to the freeway
You're a keeper of crimes
Fear no conviction
Grapes of wrath can only sweeten your wine (Ha, ha, ha)
[Refrain: FITZ]
But you don't even know
I can make your hands clap
Said I can make your hands clap

[Pre-Chorus: FITZ, FITZ & Noelle Scaggs]
Every night when the stars come out
Am I the only living soul around?
Need to believe you could hold me down
'Cause I'm in need of somethin' good right now
We could be screamin' 'til the sun comes out
And when we wake we'd be the only sound
I get on my knees and say a prayer, James Brown

[Chorus: FITZ & Noelle Scaggs, Noelle Scaggs]
That I can make your hands clap
That I can make your hands clap
That I can make your hands clap
(Yeah-yeah, oh, oh, yeah-yeah)
That I can make your hands clap
(Yeah-yeah, oh, oh)
So can I get a handclap?

[Outro]
(Huh-huh)16Embed

songs.full_title: The Walker by Fitz and The Tantrums
songs.title: The Walker

description.plain: “The Walker” by Mike Fitzpatrick and Chris Seefried appears on the Fitz and the Tantrums album, “More Than Just A Dream” – 2013.  It’s written in the first person with the protagonist describing his feelings about life in L.A. People think he’s crazy for the things he says and does. He’s a fast-paced hipster (and more than a little overdosed on caffeine).
